snippet.title: Mean Bean Tsuu - Official SHC Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
The trailer for Mean Bean Tsu finally here! 

Mean Bean Tsuu is coming to SHC 2024! Mean Bean Tsuu is a hack of Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine which aims to be a sequel to the original game, featuring new mechanics from Puyo Puyo Tsuu, as well as a story more in line with that of Japanese Classic Sonic canon. This demo consists of a 4-stage prequel story, showcasing the outcome of the original robots from Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine, and their last ditch efforts to please Dr. Robotnik. As the game is still early in development, it still follows Mean Bean's original mechanics.

The SHC Demo will feature:
-   An exclusive new story made for SHC 2024
-   Progressive Puyo Colour counts for stages
-   3 Brand New Stage Boards inspired from Classic Sonic locations
-   2 New Mean Bean remixes of Classic Sonic tunes
-   New character art for Dr. Robotnik's "Number 1" robot, Coconuts
-   Other miscellaneous fixes (mostly music related)

Video footage recorded through BlastEm.
Trailer Audio sourced through the 16-bit Audiophile Project and BlastEm.
Mean Bean Tsuu is developed by Team Tsuu.

Download Mean Bean Tsuu here!:
https://shc.zone/entries/contest2024/1124

ROM Hack: Mean Bean Tsuu
Source Game: Dr. Robtnik's Mean Bean Machine
System: Mega Drive/Genesis
